titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to authorize State-licensed appraisers to conduct appraisals in connection with mortgages insured by the FHA and to ensure compliance with the existing appraiser education and competency requirements, and for other purposes.
FHA Appraiser Eligibility Expansion Act
FHA Appraiser Eligibility Expansion Act
FHA Appraiser Eligibility Expansion Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
